title: THEY HAVE FUN AND MAKE MILLIONS: These are the richest gamers
caption: Top-earning gamers are more influential than elite athletes. They earn millions using the fact that millions follow them on social platforms, with the help of which they make various sponsorships.
alt: THEY HAVE FUN AND MAKE MILLIONS

title: Top 8 ways to make money playing video games
caption: Experts on making money online say that we can't make money playing video games. Professional players know that they can earn big money in tournaments, similar to professional sports.
alt: Top 8 ways to make money playing video games
